channel.title: Red Hue
channel.description:
Recently got a GTX460 Nvidia card, and i seem to randomly get a red or yellowish hue every now and again, it's rether annoying seeing as i can't see what i'm doing whilst playing most of my games.
Any one know what's up?

item.title: Red Hue
item.dc:creator: Fnoigy
item.description:
Check your monitor connection. Sometimes, you can lose contact for a single color channel, which would cause things to all go tinted.

Otherwise, make sure everything about your video card is properly seated.

Read full topic
